Instruction: Gather all the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add the flour mixture to the cream mixture, stirring until just combined.
Bake in the preheated oven until the custard is set but still wobbly in the center, about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove ramekins from the water bath and let cool.
Remove ramekins from hot water and chill in the refrigerator until cold, at least 2 hours.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a muffin tin or line with cupcake liners.
